mapper.select: SELECT mr.request_is_branch, mr.request_mile_name, mr.request_mil_max, mr.request_admin, mr.request_etc, mr.request, mr.user_no, mr.mileage_request_date, mr.request_status, m.mile_no, m.mile_name FROM mileage_request mr JOIN mileage m ON mr.mile_no = m.mile_no WHERE mr.user_no = #{user_no};
